alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 8:19AM CST until December 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning Continues For The Following Rivers In Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Rockwall, Kaufman and Hunt Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
